channel.title: Big error, and very confused!
channel.description:
Can someone please tell me how to sort this issue? I can't seem to find what i've done wrong that has caused this to suddenly happen? :S
[code] ^ client.java:10810: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom")))) ^ client.java:10810: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom")))) ^ client.java:10810: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom")))) ^ client.java:10810: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom")))) ^ client.java:10810: ')' expected if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom")))) ^ client.java:10810: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom")))) ^ client.java:10810: invalid method declaration; return type required if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom")))) ^ client.java:10810: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && ((playerName.equalsIgnor eCase("Alex")) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tom"))))

You have compiled Alex's Awesome Server!

i'm not sure what this error is trying to tell me, and if i'm a noob, then forgive me for my ignorance. I'm new to scripting, and im not sure how to fix this problem, as i never eddited that part of the code :S

item.title: Big error, and very confused!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:14, topic:419270”]post your error one last time and I’ll fix it…
But you need to learn how to read a compiler, I remember when I first started out a compiler error looked like a fucking cornmaze too…[/quote]

Thankyou Acorn, but i’ve managed to fix it, Flippin heck knows how, but hey!

Do you have msn? or any thing like that?

item.title: Big error, and very confused!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

I am using my eyes and mind, but to me, quite clearly that isn’t helping!

What’s the point in asking for help if the only answer i get is “Use your eyes and mind”?

Atleast explain what i’ve done wrong for me… How am i supposed to get these errors to gtfo the server? All i see on that damn compiler screen is a load of shit, that i don’t understand!

It’s like asking my to look at a completely different language, and tell the person why it doesn’t make sense. Unless i have a basic understanding of what it is i need to do, i can’t make any judgement, on what is wrong.
So, please, just help me! :S

EDIT, Nevermind, i’ve fixed it. Just had to bullshit my way through trial and error.

Read full topic

item.title: Big error, and very confused!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

It’s anti leech,
it’s from the make of the server to protect his work against noobs like you
so they can’t just change the name and host it.
Just some little errors put in it what freaks noobs out.

And if u already want to quit after this its indeed better that u just go play instead code,

Read full topic

item.title: Big error, and very confused!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Alright, but learning to fix an issue i have no experience over can’t help me atall, since i have no base to work off, and i’d have no idea where to start.

I’ve just started, and i don’t understand any of it :S

What gets me is that i didn’t even change it, and suddenly when i compile after compiling hundreds of times, it comes up with errors, it must have something to do with what i’ve eddited further up the code, but fuck it, i have no clue. I’ll have to scrap it all, and go back to playing other peoples servers. Clearly i’m not cut out for this.

Read full topic
